Class Instance2DDistanceMatrix

java.lang.Object
Instance2D
Instance2DDistanceMatrix
public class Instance2DDistanceMatrix extends Instance2D
Class containing one Euclidean TSP instance. In this class, the complete distance matrix is created in the constructor.
